markers.text:
Bleethuae MI-B d402
Flyby
Planet AB 3 A is a moon of a brown dwarf with large rings that pass within 300 km of the surface.

Prooe Flyi QH-X b7-65
Ferrous Fields
Planet A is a 100% metal body orbiting the M-class star at a mere 1.80 light-seconds.

Plaa Scraa EA-A e114
Aikhtiar Almughamara
Three Neutron Stars and a White Dwarf.

Phroi Bluae IR-W f1-1530
Newton's Necropolis
Planet 1 A is a metal-rich body, with a whopping 10.66g

Prae Pruae TL-B d14-14
Eye of Boreas
Planet 8's rings are so massive.

Fachiae OM-F c26-0 (Fractures of Fachiae)
Abundance of water geysers, canyons deeper than 10km

Oopailn NP-R c7-3 (Oopailn Mists)
Geosite #6 is advised as it offers a view of the Gas Giant from inside the canyon

Streau Eop ZP-N c23-0 (Calidum Capsicum Annuum (Hot Potato))
Around the primary star there orbits a curiously misshapen orange-red potato-like world
